effect.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.
effect.full: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.

description.sun-moon: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
description.sword-shield: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
